description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

panels.description: Shows the status of the integration.
panels.title: Integration Status

panels.description: Shows the latest timestamp at which the metrics were received for this integration.
panels.title: Latest Metric Received

panels.description: Shows the installed version of this integration.
panels.title: Integration Version

targets.expr: hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"}

hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"}

hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", pool="$hikaricp"}

label_replace(label_replace(sum by(application,job,method,uri,status)(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(application,job,method,uri,status)(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval])), "uri", "$2$4$5", "uri", "((.*version)([^\\}]*)(\\}.*))|(.*)"), "uri", "$2$4$5", "uri", "((.*targetPlatform)([^\\}]*)(\\}.*))|(.*)")

label_replace(label_replace(sum by(application,job,method,uri)(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", uri!~".*actuator.*", status=~"2[0-9][0-9]"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(application,job,method,uri)(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", application=~"$application", uri!~".*actuator.*", status=~"2[0-9][0-9]"}[$__rate_interval])), "uri", "$2$4$5", "uri", "((.*version)([^\\}]*)(\\}.*))|(.*)"), "uri", "$2$4$5", "uri", "((.*targetPlatform)([^\\}]*)(\\}.*))|(.*)")

title: Spring Boot Statistics
